name: HotelPlanner
0:
”Alexa ask Hotel Planner to make a new reservation in Miami Florida”
”Alexa ask Hotel Planner to make a new reservation”
”Alexa open Hotel Planner”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: hotel planner
Developer Terms of Use
des:
This service will patch you to live expert Hotel Planner to assist you in making any new hotel reservation around the world. With this hotel booking service, its like having your own personal travel concierge at your beck and call, 24x7, anytime you need them. You can save hours of clicking around the internet searching various hotel sites for availability and pricing. 

HotelPlanner.com uses machine learning to try and route you to a Hotel Planner expert that will give you a great booking experience and many times they live in the destination where you are going so that they can give you localized knowledge and advice.
